long_description: Recommended for children from 6 - 18 mos. old, the Thule Baby Supporter helps provide some extra support in the stroller as your little one grows and learns to sit upright. Padded sides and head rest also make it more comfortable during naps. Head rest is adjustable for growing children and can be removed when using a helmet. Please note: If you have any doubt whether your child fits properly and comfortably in this product, please consult your pediatrician. Compatible with all Thule strollers, sold separately.
short_description: Recommended for children from 6 - 18 mos. old, the Thule Baby Supporter helps provide some extra support in the stroller as your little one grows and learns to sit upright.
